name: Bounce and Box
description:
This is an arcade game where you use arrow keys and the spacebar to jump on top of falling objects in order to get higher and higher above the ground, but watch out: the higher you get, the faster the objects fall.

I made this game pretty quickly. I know it isn’t anything really amazing, but please check out my other games that I put more time into. Those will have much better quality and you will likely have much more fun with those.
